introduction.p: Welcome to this fine piece of carefully crafted hypertext... The authors sincerely hope that you find something interesting or, better yet, something useful here!

collapse.p: If you do then please feel free to use the content in whichever way you consider appropriate. Go ahead and share, link or copy. The authors were glad if you'd let them know and provide feedback, but you don't have to if you don't want to.
